dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SAP Data Intelligence 3 on CaaS Platform 4.2

meta: SAP DI 3 on SUSE CaaSP 4.2 Installation Guide
This document describes the installation and configuration of SUSE CaaS Platform 4.2 and SAP Data Intelligence 3.
How to install SAP DI 3 on SUSE CaaSP 4.2

meta.name: productname
meta.productname: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications

meta: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15

abstract.para: SAP Data Intelligence 3 is the tool set to govern big amount of data. SUSE CaaS Platform 4 is the Kubernetes base that makes deploying SAP Data Intelligence 3 easy. This document describes the installation and configuration of SUSE CaaS Platform 4 and SAP Data Intelligence 3.
